titles.title: Hymn 116 - For Mercy O Dear Lord I Plead

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For mercy o dear Lord I plead
Thy pardon now humbly I crave
Thy cleansing blood my needs to meet
For health, and life, a ransomed soul

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For grace and strength dear Lord I pray
Thy power to live ov'r coming life
Spirit divine burning within
My frail vanquished, old life subdue

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My Lord, pure, changeless, Lord revive
My zeal ever to serve inspire
A will and mind the test endure
Till Christ returns and vict'ry won
